object_name.value: Validate document belongs to GMP or Med Device domains

title.value: Ensures document belongs to GMP or Med Device domain.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
Only GMP or Med Device CAT 1 documents will be sent to Withdrawal Workflow.
dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where not exists (select * from cd_quality_gmp where domain ='GMP' or domain ='Med Device')
